info.name: vector graphics 2c
info.description:
false 3D

NB:  You can add more turns with [int]*atan
        You can change number of lines: O.a++ < 13*k ; O.a/2/k

renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/WlySzh

#define mainImage(O,u)                                         \
    vec2 A = iResolution.xy,                                   \
         U = ( u+u - A ) / A.y;                                \
    for ( float a = atan(U.y,U.x), l=0., t=iTime;              \
          l++ < 7.;                                            \
          O = max(O, ( 2.- abs(A)/fwidth(A) ).y                \
                    *(3.+A.x)*.1                               \
                  *(1.+ cos( l/2.77+3.*a-t  + vec4(0,23,21,0)))\
                    *exp(-abs(fract(l/3.77+a/6.3-t)-.5)*8.))   \
        )                                                      \
        A = cos( l +a -.3*t+ vec2(0,33) ),                     \
        A.y = length( U +vec2(0, U.y*.3-.13*A) ) -.6 -.2*A.y
renderpass.name: Image
